title: Water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) index for primary healthcare facilities: Towards achieving WASH security
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Enovwo E. Odjegba, Abayomi O. Bankole, Adebayo Sadiq, Barakat O. Layi-Adigun, Abayomi M. Adebimpe, Mariam O. Kosemani, Emmanuel B. Ojo, Mustapha A. Adewuyi
